question: A pipe can fill a tank in 'x' hours and another pipe can empty it in 'y' hours (y > x). If both the pipes are open, in how many hours will the tank be filled?
explanation:
Part of the tank filled in 1 hour = $latex \\frac{1}{x}&s=1$
Part of the tank emptyied in 1 hour = $latex \\frac{1}{y}&s=1$
Part of the tank filled in 1 hour when both are opened = $latex \\frac{1}{x}-\\frac{1}{y}= \\frac{y-x}{xy}&s=1$
âˆ´ Tank will be filled in $latex \\frac{xy}{y-x}&s=1$ hours
Hence option [C] is the right answer
